name: Chill Beats to Beachcomb to
description:
A chill VR game where you collect stuff on a beach listening to lo-fi beats.

Platforms: Oculus Rift S (or Quest with link cable) & HTC Vive.

This is a small project created for Global Game Jam 2021. 

Credits:
Aramis Marcuola-Bel

Kim Smith

Mathew Palumbo

Rory Campbell
